column2: Wandering goblins can sometimes be found trailing Troll tribes in hope of picking clean any discarded carcasses. Ugma pressed these gobbos into service and they make for good scouts and archers keeping scavengers away.

The Goblins of the Carrion Tribe are largely ignored by the Trolls as long as they find enough food, something the squig hoppers have no difficulty in.  At any rate it's a much better deal than you'd get under an orc.
The number of goblins under Ugma's service grew so large he ordained them as the Carrion Tribe, with a new sense of belonging these outcasts gladly make up the chaff for Ugma's armies

These terrifying creatures are similar in appearance to their kin the Stone Trolls but of a much darker complexion. They are attributed in myth to utter a deep guttural sound, akin to mocking laughter before they tear their prey to pieces."
